data.message: The pages manager used to be more helpful for businesses, what happened to the pages feed for it? The one on my main page mixes personal g and business and makes networking difficult, and not all the businesses show up reliably. I have to go to each page.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Carmen. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/1UYPR55. -Jordan
Put the pages feed back on the pages manager so it's only business contacts and not a mix of business and personal.
